mapper.insert: insert into task(name, task_type, project_id, module_id, requirement_id, "describe", priority, begin_date, end_date, handler, finisher, create_by, create_time, estimate_hours, task_status) VALUES ( #{name}, '${taskType}', #{projectId}, #{moduleId}, #{requirementId}, #{describe}, #{priority}, #{beginDate},#{endDate},#{handler},#{finisher}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{estimateHours},'${taskStatus}')
mapper.select: select a.id, a.name, a.task_type, a.project_id, a.module_id, a.requirement_id, a."describe", a.priority, a.begin_date, a.end_date, a.handler, a.finisher, a.create_by, a.create_time, a.estimate_hours, a.cost_hours, a.task_status, b.name project_name, c.name moduleName, g.name requirementName, e.name handler_name, f.name create_by_name, h.name finisher_name from "task" a left join project b on a.project_id = b.id left join module c on c.id = a.module_id left join requirement g on g.id = a.requirement_id left join "user" e on e.id = a.handler left join "user" f on f.id = a.create_by left join "user" h on h.id = a.finisher where a.id=#{id}

select sum(case when x.task_status = '未开始' then 1 else 0 end) unstartCnt, sum(case when x.task_status = '进行中' then 1 else 0 end) doingCnt, sum(case when x.task_status = '已完成' then 1 else 0 end) finishCnt, sum(case when x.task_status = '已暂停' then 1 else 0 end) pauseCnt, sum(case when x.task_status = '已取消' then 1 else 0 end) cancelCnt, sum(case when x.task_status = '已关闭' then 1 else 0 end) closeCnt from task x
